normalized: the next day.

name: morita
normalized: oi, akiyama, listen a sec!
our 2nd period class had ended, and in the course of moving to a special classroom, morita called out to me in an awfully good mood.

name: tatsurou
normalized: what is it?
if it's dirty talk, i don't want it.
because morita had put something uncalled-for in my head yesterday, i had soured things with yukikaze.
my tone of voice unintentionally became harsh.

name: morita
normalized: what's the matter, akiyama?!
are you still mad about yesterday?
well, listen for a bit, i'm beggin' ya～
morita let out a theatrical ingratiating voice and wrapped his arm around my shoulder, like he was saying 「we're friends, aren't we?
i usually found him hard to dislike, but i was pretty ticked off after yesterday.

name: tatsurou
normalized: you're annoying.
if you have something you want to say, say it quickly.
i moved morita's arm out of the way, and listened for the hell of it, without stopping my walk.

name: morita
normalized: like, it's not dirty talk, but i do have dirty talk as well.
morita grinned suggestively.
『good news ＆ bad news』, huh?
i didn't feel like socializing with him.

name: tatsurou
normalized: do the not-dirty one.

name: morita
normalized: you listening?
okay, you see――
morita started to speak self-importantly, but, to sum it up, it was like this.
yesterday, the company my father's been investing in went public in the american federation or something, and we got rich overnight.
how awesome is that?

name: tatsurou
normalized: quit bragging!

name: morita
normalized: oi, oi, listen to my bragging all the way to the end!
morita wagged his finger in an annoying “tsk, tsk” gesture, and

name: morita
normalized: i just got a call.
they said that i've also been successfully approved for admission into the scholarship course.

name: tatsurou
normalized: huh?
what was that?!

name: morita
normalized: i'm promoting to the elite of the elite, akiyama-kun!
morita flared his nostrils with a smug expression, and straightened up pretty cockily.

name: tatsurou
normalized: （how asinine…）
despite the happy morita, i was shocked by the blatantly simplistic structure of the 『upper-class society』 that this school championed.
ultimately, this meant that the scholarship course was like a collection of strange rich people and those, like yukikaze, who could study extraordinarily hard.
nevertheless, morita's father was short-tempered as well, to make them admit his son into the scholarship course the day after he had finagled a huge amount of money.
did he want his son to become an elite so badly?
before doing something like that――well, it didn't matter.

name: morita
normalized: akiyama, don't feel awkward just because i've become a scholarship student.
we'll be friends forever!
morita placed his arm around my shoulder again, with a smile across his entire face.
i knew he was happy to become a scholarship student, but now what would he do?

name: tatsurou
normalized: （he's not a bad guy, but all the same, we're only friends during the infiltration mission.
he'll change his attitude pretty easily, especially when it comes to saying 『friends forever』 like this.

name: tatsurou
normalized: （ah… but, this is morita, so he might come to boast about life as a scholarship student.
saying stuff like, 『aren't you jealous?

name: tatsurou
normalized: （at that point, i suppose i'll try nonchalantly asking how yukikaze's doing.
yukikaze told me to 『go back』 yesterday…）
while thinking things like that, i was engaging in the conversation with morita without really listening, when――

name: shizuru
normalized: could i have a moment?
shizuru-san started talking to us from behind, as if she had snuck up on us.

name: morita
normalized: eh?
ah!
y, yes, kousaka-sensei!
morita stiffened up and let out a surprised-sounding voice.

name: shizuru
normalized: fufu.
shizuru-san glanced at me with seductive eyes, as usual, but addressed morita first.

name: shizuru
normalized: morita-kun, right?
i've heard.
congratulations on your admission into the scholarship course.

name: morita
normalized: th, thank you very much!
i, i'll, do my best!

name: tatsurou
normalized: （honestly, that morita…）
despite saying a serious-sounding thing with his mouth, the eyes that were gazing at shizuru-san were not at all those of a student looking at a teacher.
of course, he probably thought he was hiding it, himself, but they were blatantly sexual, and he couldn't conceal that at all.
furthermore, i was disgusted because his groin had already started swelling, just from being talked to briefly in the hallway.

name: tatsurou
normalized: （i suppose morita couldn't even imagine, could he?
this person is having sex with me.
she's become hooked on my cock.
he had just bragged that he was an elite, so i couldn't help but feel a sense of superiority about that.

name: shizuru
normalized: morita-kun, could you go to the office for a bit, for the formalities of your admission to the scholarship course?

name: morita
normalized: yes, understood!
right away!
without hesitation, morita bowed his head and rushed off to the office.

name: shizuru
normalized: with behaviour like that, i wonder if he can manage as a scholarship student?

name: tatsurou
normalized: is it true that that guy's a scholarship student?

name: shizuru
normalized: yup, it's the truth.
after watching morita leave and smiling a little, shizuru-san looked at me again.

name: shizuru
normalized: akiyama-kun, one moment.
eh?
her face was scary?

name: tatsurou
normalized: what is it?

name: shizuru
normalized: a little word.
her voice was scary too.
what?
had i done something to make shizuru-san angry?
by any chance, was this because i hadn't gone to her room last night?
just like that, whether i wanted to or not――
shizuru-san dragged my perplexed self into a corner of the hallway, and made me stand against the wall, where we couldn't be seen by anyone.

name: tatsurou
normalized: uh, um… shizuru-san?

name: shizuru
normalized: i was watching, tatsurou-kun.

name: tatsurou
normalized: eh?
watching what?

name: shizuru
normalized: you went to see mizuki-san yesterday, didn't you?
my heart skipped a beat.

name: tatsurou
normalized: eh?
how…?

name: shizuru
normalized: i saw you from the elite building.

name: tatsurou
normalized: from the elite building?

name: shizuru
normalized: i've started having classes over there lately.
that's why i saw you.
afternoon and evening.
twice, huh?

name: tatsurou
normalized: ah… was that so?
you truly are an infiltration expert.
deepening the infiltration moment by moment――

name: shizuru
normalized: you won't gloss over this!
donn!
shizuru-san placed both hands firmly on the wall behind me.
and then, she suddenly brought her face close to me.
it was a posture that looked like she was about to kiss me at any time, but her eyes were dreadfully scary.

name: shizuru
normalized: do you understand why we postponed the execution date for the force infiltration?

name: tatsurou
normalized: y, yes…
i was a minor infiltration-type taimanin as well, so of course i understood.
if trouble arose, you slipped under cover immediately, and then observed the situation, not letting your guard down and constantly ensuring an escape route.
it was the most basic of basics.
however――

name: shizuru
normalized: until that girl arrived, you were making a proper taimanin face.
but now you're just a boy, like that morita-kun.
do you realize that yourself?

name: tatsurou
normalized: …sorry.
had i been looking that way?
i hung my head.

name: shizuru
normalized: haah…
shizuru-san breathed a little sigh, and then ordered me.

name: shizuru
normalized: from now on, i prohibit you from meeting mizuki-san.
until you get my permission.
okay?

name: tatsurou
normalized: …yes.
i nodded.
i had no choice but to nod.

name: shizuru
normalized: i'll tell this to mizuki-san too.
can you follow that?

name: tatsurou
normalized: yes.

name: shizuru
normalized: next time you do something on your own authority, i'll have you off the mission.
i don't need a taimanin with no self-control.

name: tatsurou
normalized: y, yes!
i, i'll, uh… sorry.

name: shizuru
normalized: and that goes for contact with me, too.
on the private side of things, of course.

name: tatsurou
normalized: eh?
i reflexively raised my downcast face.
a ban on contacting her in private.
that meant i would be unable to have sex with shizuru-san.
shizuru-san was the one who had asked for it frequently up until now.
i had been satisfying those requests.
even the day before yesterday, she had done something to seduce me in front of yukikaze without hesitation.
for shizuru-san to say something like this… did i really seem so sloppy?
was shizuru-san that angry at――no, did she harbour that much of a sense of danger towards me now?
maybe so.
my mind had been constantly astir since yukikaze moved in as a scholarship student, and i was told that crazy thing by morita.

name: shizuru
normalized: don't make a face like that.
it'll be hard on me too, after all.
what's necessary for a taimanin?

name: tatsurou
normalized: self-…control…

if i was going to devote my love to yukikaze, maybe it would be best to get away from shizuru-san.
as i persuaded myself of that,

name: shizuru

well then, i'm going, okay…?
chuu☆

name: tatsurou
normalized: shizuru-san…
the feeling of that remained on my lips.
it was like she was saying, 「we'll enjoy ourselves after the mission is over, okay?
